wikipedia_page.main: Peter Emerson Jones OBE (born March 1935) is founder and chairman of the Emerson Group, one of the largest privately-owned property development companies in the United Kingdom.

response: The Emerson Group is one of the largest privately owned property development companies in the United Kingdom. Emerson was founded by Peter Emerson Jones in 1959 and is based in Alderley Edge, Cheshire, UK. Its subsidiaries include Orbit Developments (commercial property) and Jones Homes (residential). As well as UK operations, Emerson have activities in Portugal and Florida.http://www.emerson.co.uk/pdf/profile.pdf
*Peter Emerson Jones. Chairman, Emerson Group. For services to Business in the North West.
